message.body: Hope everything goes well tonight ...and really wish we could be there. Love you
Thanks for thinking of me, I'll call later tonight
I'm missing you. Did anyone video your singing last night?
Can you tell Horace Mann to send stuff regarding the car to you? I got the insurance stuff in the mail so I'll have to send it home
Rather, to change the name. USPS forwards it to me. Super annoying
